page.title: 19GOLF COURSES
page.content: Hazlehead Golf Courses, Aberdeen. There are excellent facilities for golfers at Hazlehead which boasts two eighteen hole and one nine hole course covering an area of 100 acres with an overall length of 3600m. All 3 courses are a pleasure to play being situated in picturesque woodland and giving the less keen golfer the opportunity to do a bit of wild life spotting as deer and rabbit inhabit the area. Some holes have recently been improved, greens have been enlarged, new bunkers dug and trees planted. The cost of a round of golf ranges from Â£1.65 to Â£3.60. The Nineteenth hole is very popular with club members as refreshments can be obtained there. Attached to the club house is a shop which sells souvenirs and golfing equipment.
